程序包 org.giiwa.misc

类 GImage

java.lang.Object
org.giiwa.misc.GImage
直接已知子类:
X.Image
public class GImage extends Object
The Class GImage is image utility, convert image, create QRCode image

  • 方法详细资料

    • QRCode

      public static void QRCode(File out, String text, int width, int height) throws Exception
      create QRCode image, and ouput to the file.
      参数:
      out - the output image file
      text - the content of the qrcode
      width - width of image
      height - height of image
      抛出:
      Exception - the exception

    • scale

      public static void scale(String source, int x, int y, int w0, int h0, String file, int pw, int ph, int w, int h)
      Scale the source image file to destination image file.
      参数:
      source - the source image file
      x - the x of source image
      y - the y of the source image
      w0 - the width of the source image
      h0 - the height of the source image
      file - the destination image file
      pw - the width of the destination image
      ph - the height of the destination image
      w - the width of the destination image
      h - the height of the destination image

    • scale

      public static void scale(String source, int x, int y, int w0, int h0, int w1, int h1, String file, int w, int h)
      Scale the source image to destination image file.
      参数:
      source - the source image file
      x - the x of source image
      y - the y of source image
      w0 - the width of source image
      h0 - the height of source image
      w1 - the width of source image
      h1 - the height of source image
      file - the destination image file
      w - the width of destination image
      h - the height of destination image

    • scale2

      public static void scale2(InputStream src, OutputStream dest, int w, int h) throws IOException
      以最大（高/宽）缩放， 不填充，输出w/h 不一定与参数一致
      参数:
      source - the source
      file - the file
      w - the w
      h - the h
      抛出:
      IOException

    • size

      public static Point size(InputStream in)
      get the size of image in inputstream.
      参数:
      in - the inputstream of image
      返回:
      Point of size

    • size

      public static Point size(URL url)
      get the size of image by url.
      参数:
      url - the url
      返回:
      Point of size

    • scale3

      public static void scale3(InputStream src, OutputStream dest, int w, int h) throws IOException
      以最小（高/宽）缩放， 然后裁剪，输出w/h=输入参数
      参数:
      source - the source image
      file - the destination image file
      w - the width of the destination image
      h - the height of the destination image
      抛出:
      IOException

    • mix

      public static void mix(InputStream src1, InputStream src2, OutputStream dest, int gap, int transparent, int xpos, int ypos, int num) throws IOException
      抛出:
      IOException

    • scale

      public static void scale(InputStream src, OutputStream dest, int w, int h) throws IOException
      以最小（高/宽）， 缩放收裁剪， 输出w/h=输入参数
      参数:
      source - the InputStream
      file - the file object
      w - the width
      h - the height
      抛出:
      IOException

    • scale1

      public static void scale1(InputStream src, OutputStream dest, int w, int h) throws IOException
      以最大（高/宽）缩放， 透明填充， 输出w/h=输入参数
      参数:
      source - the source image file
      file - the destination image file
      w - the width of destination image
      h - the height of destination image
      抛出:
      IOException

      抛出:
      IOException

    • cover

      public static void cover(String dest, int w, int h, List<String> sources) throws Exception
      make a Cover by source images.
      参数:
      dest - the destination cover image file
      w - the width of destination image
      h - the height of destination image
      sources - the source image files, should be 4, or 9
      抛出:
      Exception - the exception

    • cover

      public static boolean cover(String dest, int type, int w, int h, List<String> sources) throws Exception
      make a cover by source images.
      参数:
      dest - the destination of cover image
      type - the type of cover image
      w - the width of cover image
      h - the height of cover image
      sources - the source images files
      返回:
      true, if successful
      抛出:
      Exception - the exception

    • cut

      public static void cut(String source, int w, int h, String target)

    • cover

      public static void cover(int w, String s, Color color, OutputStream output)
